content.question: Which of the following best describes the relationship of the western European working class to organized religion in the late nineteenth century?

choices.label: Renewed and strengthened by religious revivalism
Strengthened by church support for unions
Weakened, especially in highly industrialized areas

content.answer: Weakened, especially in highly industrialized areas

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
